citances.sentence: In any event LFF's capacity to meet a costs order is not a relevant consideration in determining whether an order should be made: see Scott v Secretary, Department of Social Security (No 2) [2000] FCA 1450 at [4] (French and Beaumont JJ); Blue Wedges Inc v Minister for the Environment, Heritage and the Arts (No 2) [2008] FCA 1106 at [14] (North J).
